ComicInfo.Summary:
Red Riding Hood: Vampirella goes to work as a dancer in a strip club where three dancers have been killed the last three full moons. Vampirella lays in wait for the werewolf and slays it.
Feary Tales: Recap and intro for the next story.
Vampirella and the Three Bears: Vampirella meets the three Beary brothers who turn out to be werebears. Vampirella knocks them out and tries to find out what happened to the previous woman who visited them but she is transported into a new tale.
ComicInfo.Title: Red Riding Hood; Feary Tales; Vampirella and the Three Bears
ComicInfo.Writer: Elaine Lee,Joe R. Lansdale,Keith Lansdale,Nancy A. Collins
